Name: Harry Potter
Line: I can't let you out, Hedwig. I'm not allowed to use magic outside of school. Besides, if Uncle Vernon…

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Now you've done it.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: But she's bored! If I could only let outonly let out for an hour or two.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: But I haven't had any messages from any of my friends… not one… all summer.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: I'll be in my bedroom, making no noise and pretending that I don't exist.

Name: Dobby
Line: Ha- ha- ha! Ha, ha! Ho, ho, ho! Ha, ha! Harry Potter! Such an honor it is!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Who are you?

Name: Dobby
Line: Dobby sir, Dobby the house elf.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Not to be to be rude or anything, but this isn't a great time for me to have a house elf in my bedroom.

Name: Dobby
Line: Oh, oh yes, sir! Dobby understands! It's just that, Dobby has come to tell you- it is difficult, sir- Dobby wonders where to begin?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Why don't you sit down?

Name: Dobby
Line: S-sit down? S-sit- sit down? Oh, oh, ho. Oh, ho, ho… Oh, ho, ho. Ohh, ho, hoo…

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Dobby, ssh! I'm sorry! I didn't mean to offend you, or anything.

Name: Dobby
Line: Offend Dobby? Dobby has heard of your greatness, sir, but never has he been asked to sit down by a wizard, like an equal.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: You can't have met many decent wizards then.

Name: Dobby
Line: No, I haven't. That was an awful thing to say. Bad Dobby!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Stop, Dobby!

Name: Dobby
Line: Bad Dobby!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Dobby, shh!

Name: Dobby
Line: Baaad Dobby!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Dobby, please stop!

Name: Dobby
Line: Bad Dobby. Bad Dobby!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Stop! Stop, Dobby. Please be quiet! Are you all right?

Name: Dobby
Line: Dobby had to punish himself, sir. Dobby almost spoke ill of his family, sir.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Your family?

Name: Dobby
Line: The wizard family Dobby serves, sir. Dobby is bound to serve one family forever. If they ever knew Dobby was here…ooh… But Dobby had to come. Dobby has to protect Harry Potter- to warn him. Harry Potter must not go back to Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry this year! There is a plot, a plot to make most terrible things happen.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: What terrible things? Who's plotting them?

Name: Dobby
Line: Ooo… er… can't… say… argh...

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Ok– I- understand. You can't- say.

Name: Dobby
Line: Don't make me talk, I— Errr…

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Dobby! Dobby, put the lamp down.

Name: Dobby
Line: Bad Dobby.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Give me the lamp! Dobby stop!

Name: Dobby
Line: Let me go!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Get in there, and keep quiet!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: I- I was just—

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Sorry.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Yes, sir… See why I've got to go back? I don't belong here. I belong in your world, at Hogwarts. It's the only place I've got friends!

Name: Dobby
Line: Friends who don't even write to Harry Potter?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Well, I expect they've… been- hang on- how do you know my friends haven't been writing to me?

Name: Dobby
Line: Harry Potter mustn't be angry with Dobby. Heh- Dobby hoped, if Harry Potter thought his friends had forgotten him, Harry Potter might not want to go back to school, sir.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Give me those, now!

Name: Dobby
Line: No! Ahh! Ooh…

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Dobby, get back here!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Dobby, please, no!

Name: Dobby
Line: Harry Potter must say he's not going back to school!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: I can't. Hogwarts is my home!

Name: Dobby
Line: Then, Dobby must do it, sir, for Harry Potter's own good.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Ron! Fred. George. What are you all doing here?

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Rescuing you, of course. Now, come on. Get your trunk!…

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: You'd better stand back. Let's go!

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Come on.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Come on, Harry! Hurry up!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Ahh- ahh!

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: I've got you Harry!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Let go of me!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Get off!

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Drive!

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Do you think it'd be all right if we had some of this?

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: It's not much, but it's home.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: I think it's brilliant

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: They were starving him, Mum. There were bars on his window!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Hello. W-what did I do?

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Ginny. She's been talking about you all summer. A bit annoying really.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Morning, Dad.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Raids?

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Dad works in the Ministry of Magic, in the Misuse of Muggle Artifacts Office. Dad loves Muggles, thinks they're fascinating.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Oh, sorry sir. I'm Harry, sir, Harry Potter.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Oh, it…

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Oh, it…

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Oh, umm…

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: He's always doing that.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: But Harry's never traveled by Floo powder before, Mum.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Floo powder?

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Diagon Alley!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: 'Diaganilly.'

Name: Harry Potter
Line: I'm fine, thank you. I- I was just…

Name: Harry Potter
Line: No! Please!

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: Harry?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Hagrid!

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: What do you think you're doing down 'ere? Come on!

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: Yer a mess, Harry. Skulkin' 'round Knockturn Alley? Dodgy place! Don' want no one ter see you there. People'll think you were up to no good.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: I was lost, I— hang on. What were you doing down there, then?

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: Me? Oh, I was… um… I was lookin' for Flesh-Eatin' Slug Repellent. They're ruinin' all the school cabbages.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Harry! Hagrid!

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: Hello, Hermione!

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Oh, it's so good to see you!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Well, it's great to see you, too!

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: What did you do to your glasses? Oculus reparo.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: I definitely need to remember that one.

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: You'll be all right now then, Harry? Right. I'll leave you to it, then.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Ok! Bye!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Thank you. Bye.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Come on! Everyone's been so worried.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Mum fancies him.

Name: Gilderoy Lockhart
Line: It can't be- Harry Potter?

Name: Gilderoy Lockhart
Line: Nice big smile, Harry. Together you and I rate the front page! Ladies and gentlemen, what an extraordinary moment this is. When young Harry stepped into Flourish and Blotts this morning to purchase my autobiography, Magical Me,… which, incidentally is currently celebrating its 27th week atop the Daily Prophet bestseller list, he had no idea that he would, in fact, be leaving… with my entire collected works, free of charge. Now, ladies?

Name: Draco Malfoy
Line: I'll bet you loved that, didn't you, Potter? Famous Harry Potter! Can't even go into a bookshop without making the front page.

Name: Draco Malfoy
Line: Oh look, Potter. You've got yourself a girlfriend.

Name: Lucius Malfoy
Line: Now, now Draco, play nicely. Mr. Potter… Lucius Malfoy. We meet at last. Forgive me, your scar is legend, as, of course, is the wizard who gave it to you.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Voldemort killed my parents. He was nothing more than a murderer.

Name: Lucius Malfoy
Line: Hmm. You must be very brave, to mention his name…or very foolish.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Fear of a name only increase fear of the thing itself.

Name: Lucius Malfoy
Line: And you must be… Miss Granger. Yes, Draco's told me all about you, and your parents. Muggles, aren't they? Let me see…red hair… vacant expressions… tatty second hand book. You must be the Weasleys.

Name: Lucius Malfoy
Line: Well, well, well. Weasley senior.

Name: Lucius Malfoy
Line: Busy time at the Ministry, Arthur, all those extra raids? I do hope they're paying you overtime, but judging by the state of this, I'd say not. What's the use in being a disgrace to the name of wizard if they don't even pay you well for it.

Name: Lucius Malfoy
Line: Clearly. Associating with Muggles… and I thought your family could sink no lower. I'll see you at work.

Name: Draco Malfoy
Line: See you at school.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Let's go.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Aah!

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Whao!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Sorry. Lost- lost control of the trolley. Why can't we get through?

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: I don't know. The gateway's sealed its self for some reason.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: The train leaves at exactly eleven o'clock. We've missed it!

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Harry, if we can't get through, maybe Mum and Dad can't get back!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Maybe we should just go and wait by the car.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: The car…

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Ron, I should tell you, most Muggles aren't accustomed to seeing a flying car.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Uh, right. Okay.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Oh no! The Invisibility Booster must be faulty!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Well come on, then. Let's go lower. We need to find the train.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Okay.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Now all we need to do is catch up with the train.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: We can't be far behind.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Do you hear that?

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: We must be gettin' close.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Hold on…

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Aaahhh! Aaahhhh! Aaahhh!

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Aaahhh! Aaahhhh! Aaahhh!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Wha-aahhh!

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Harry! Hold on! Take my hand! Hold on!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: I'm trying. Your hand's all sweaty.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: I think we found the train.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Yeah.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Welcome home.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Up! Up!

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: It's not working! Ahhhh!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Up! Up! Ron! Mind that tree!

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Stop! Stop! Stop! Huh… Aahh!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Ahh!

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Ahh-ha-ha! My wand! Look at my wand!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Be thankful it's not your neck.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: What's happening?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: I don't know.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Ahh! Ahh! Ahh!

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Ahh! Ahh! Ahh!

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Ahh! Ahhhh! Ahh!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Aaaahhhh!

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Aaaahhhh!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Come on! Go! Fast!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Ahh!

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Ahh!

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Scabbers, you OK? The car! …Dad's gonna kill me.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: See you, Hedwig. So, a house elf shows up in my bedroom, we can't get through the barrier to platform nine and three-quarters, we almost get killed by a tree… clearly someone doesn't want me here this year.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Honestly, Professor Snape, I think it did more damage to us.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: …They are not.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Professor Dumbledore. Professor McGonagall.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: I am well aware of our bylaws, Severus, having written quite a few of them myself. However, as head of Gryffindor house, it is for Professor McGonagall to determine the appropriate action.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: We'll go and get our stuff, then.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: You're going to expel us, aren't you?

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Mandrake, or Mandragora, is used to return those who have been Petrified to their original state. It's also quite dangerous. The Mandrake's cry is fatal to anyone who hears it.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Huhh… Say it, I'm doomed.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: You're doomed.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Oh- Hi, Colin. Nice to meet you.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Bloody bird's a menace. Oh, no!

Name: Gilderoy Lockhart
Line: Let me introduce you to your new Defense Against the Dark Arts teacher… me! Gilderoy Lockhart, Order of Merlin, Third Class, Honorary Member of the Dark Force Defense League, and five-times winner of Witch Weekly's Most-Charming-Smile Award- but I don't talk about that. I didn't get rid of the Bandon Banshee by smiling at him. Huh, huh, huh… hee, hee… Now- be warned! It is my job to arm you against the foulest creatures known to wizardkind. You may find yourselves facing your worst fears in this room. Know only that no harm can befall you whilst I am here. I must ask you not to scream. It might… provoke them!

Name: Gilderoy Lockhart
Line: Freshly caught Cornish pixies!

Name: Gilderoy Lockhart
Line: Laugh if you will, Mr. Finnigan, but pixies can be devilish tricky little blighters. Let's see what you make of them, ha! Come on now- round them up, round them up, they're only pixies!

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Get off me!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Stop! Stop! Hold still!

Name: Gilderoy Lockhart
Line: Peskipiksi pesternomi!

Name: Gilderoy Lockhart
Line: I'll ask you three to just nip the rest of them back into their cage!

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: What do we do now?

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Immobulus!

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Uh-oh. I smell trouble.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Malfoy?

Name: Draco Malfoy
Line: That's right. And that's not all that new this year.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Those are Nimbus Two Thousand and Ones! How did you get those?

Name: Draco Malfoy
Line: You see Weasley, unlike some, my father can afford the best.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: At least no one on the Gryffindor team had to buy their way in. They got it on pure talent.

Name: Draco Malfoy
Line: No one asked your opinion, you filthy little Mudblood!

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: You'll pay for that one, Malfoy. Eat slugs!

Name: Draco Malfoy
Line: Ha, ha!

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: You okay, Ron? Say something!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: No, Colin! Get out of the way! Let's take him to Hagrid's.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: He'll know what to do.

Name: Draco Malfoy
Line: Ha, ha…

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: Wo, this calls for a specialist's equipment. Nothin' to do but wait'll it stops, I'm afraid.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Ah! Oh… Okay.

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: Better out than in. Who's Ron tryin' to curse, anyway?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Malfoy. He called Hermione, …um, well, I don't- I don't know exactly what it means.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: He called me a Mudblood.

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: He did not!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: What's a Mudblood?

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: It means “dirty blood.” Mudblood's a really foul name for someone who is Muggle-born. Someone with non-magic parents. Someone like me. It's not a term one usually hears in civilized conversation.

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: See, the thing is, Harry, there're some wizards, like the Malfoy family, who think they're better'n everyone else because they're what people call “pure blood.”

Name: Harry Potter
Line: That's horrible!

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: It's disgusting.

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: And it's codswallop, to boot. “Dirty blood.” Why, there isn't a wizard alive today that's not half blood or less. More ter the point, they've yet to think of a spell that our Hermione can' do. Come here… Don't you think on it, Hermione. Don't you think on it for one minute… eh?

Name: Gilderoy Lockhart
Line: Harry, Harry, Harry… Can you possibly imagine a better way to serve detention than by helping me to answer my fan mail?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Not really.

Name: Gilderoy Lockhart
Line: Fame is a fickle friend, Harry. Celebrity is as celebrity does. Remember that.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: What?

Name: Gilderoy Lockhart
Line: Sorry?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: That voice.

Name: Gilderoy Lockhart
Line: Voice?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Didn't you hear it?

Name: Gilderoy Lockhart
Line: What are you talking about, Harry? I think we're getting a bit a- drowsy. And, Great Scott- no wonder! Look at the time! We've been here nearly four hours! Spooky how the time flies when one's having fun. Heh, heh.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Spooky.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Harry!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Did you hear it?

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Hear what?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: That voice.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Voice? What voice?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: I heard it first in Lockhart's office. And then again just—

Name: Harry Potter
Line: It's moving. I think it's going to kill.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Kill?

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Harry, wait! Not so fast!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Strange. I've never seen spiders act like that.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: I don't like spiders… What's that?

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: 'The Chamber of Secrets has been opened… enemies the heir… beware.' It's written in blood.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Oh, no… It's Filch's cat. It's Mrs. Norris.

Name: Draco Malfoy
Line: 'Enemies of the heir beware!' You'll be next, Mudbloods!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: No. No.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Argus! Argus, I… Everyone will proceed to their dormitories immediately. Everyone except… you three.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: She's not dead, Argus. She has been Petrified.

Name: Gilderoy Lockhart
Line: Ah, thought so. So unlucky I wasn't there. I know exactly the counter curse that could have spared her.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: But how she has been Petrified, I cannot say…

Name: Harry Potter
Line: It's not true sir, I swear. I never touched Mrs. Norris.

Name: Gilderoy Lockhart
Line: I'm afraid that's my doing, Severus. You see, Harry was helping me answer my fan mail.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: That's why Ron and I went looking for him, Professor. We'd just found him when he said…

Name: Harry Potter
Line: When I said I wasn't hungry. We were heading back to the common room when we found Mrs. Norris.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Innocent until proven guilty, Severus.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: We will be able to cure her, Argus. As I understand it, Madame Sprout has a very healthy growth of Mandrakes. When matured, a potion will be made which will revive Mrs. Norris. And in the meantime, I strongly recommend caution… to all.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: It's a bit strange, isn't it?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Strange?

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: You hear this voice, a voice only you can hear, and then Mrs. Norris turns up Petrified. It's just… strange.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Do you think I should have told them? Dumbledore and the others, I mean?

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Are you mad?

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: No, Harry. Even in the wizarding world, hearing voices isn't a good sign.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Ahem. Vera verto!

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Professor, I was wondering if you could tell us about…the Chamber of Secrets?

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Three guesses who.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Muggle-borns.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Professor? What exactly does legend tell us lies within the Chamber?

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: D'you think it's true? D'you think there really is a Chamber of Secrets?

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Yes. Couldn't you tell? McGonagall's worried. All the teachers are.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Well, if there really is a Chamber of Secrets, a-and it really has been opened, then that means---

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: The Heir of Slytherin has returned to Hogwarts. The question is, who is it?

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Let's think. Who do we know who thinks all Muggle-borns are scum?

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: If you're talking about Malfoy.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Of course. You heard him! 'You'll be next Mudbloods,'

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: I heard him. But Malfoy, the Heir of Slytherin?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Well, maybe Ron's right, Hermione. I mean, look at his family. The whole lot of them have been in Slytherin for centuries.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Crabbe and Goyle must know. Maybe we could trick them into telling.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Even they aren't that thick. But there might be another way. Mind you, it would be difficult. Not to mention, we would be breaking about fifty school rules. And, it'll be dangerous. Very dangerous.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Here it is. 'The Polyjuice Potion.'  'Properly brewed, the Polyjuice Potion allows the drinker to transform himself temporarily into the physical form of another.'

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Do you mean, if Harry and I drink that stuff, we'll turn into Crabbe and Goyle?

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Yes.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Wicked! Malfoy'll tell us anything.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Exactly. But it's tricky. I've never seen a more complicated potion.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Well, how long will it take to make?

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: A month.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: A month? But, Hermione, if Malfoy is the Heir of Slytherin, he could attack half the Muggle-borns in the school by then.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: I know. But it's the only plan we've got.

Name: Draco Malfoy
Line: All right there, Scarhead?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Wood! Look out!

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: Blimey! Harry's got himself a rogue Bludger! That's been tampered with, that has!

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: I'll stop it.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: No! Even with a proper wand it's too risky. You could hit Harry!

Name: Draco Malfoy
Line: Training for the ballet, Potter?

Name: Draco Malfoy
Line: You'll never catch me, Potter!

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Let's go.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Finite incantatem!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Thank you.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Are you okay?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: No, I think my- I think my arm's broken.

Name: Gilderoy Lockhart
Line: Not to worry, Harry. I will fix that arm of yours straight away.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: No, not you.

Name: Gilderoy Lockhart
Line: Oh, poor boy doesn't know what he's saying. Now, this… won't hurt a bit. Brackium emendo!

Name: Gilderoy Lockhart
Line: Ah, yes, well, ha, that can sometimes happen, um, butuh, the point is, uh,…

Name: Gilderoy Lockhart
Line: …you can no longer feel any pain, and, heh- very clearly, the bones are not broken.

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: Broken? There's no bones left!

Name: Gilderoy Lockhart
Line: Much more flexible, though.

Name: Draco Malfoy
Line: Uhh, uhhh…

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: You will be able to, won't you?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Ugh!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Uh!

Name: Dobby
Line: Hello!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Dobby?

Name: Dobby
Line: Harry Potter should have listened to Dobby! Harry Potter should have gone back home when he missed the train.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: It was you… You stopped the barrier from letting Ron and me through.

Name: Dobby
Line: Indeed. Yes, sir.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: You nearly got Ron and me expelled!

Name: Dobby
Line: At least you would be away from here. Harry Potter must go home! Dobby thought his Bludger would be enough to make Harry Potter see that---

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Your Bludger? You made that Bludger chase after me?

Name: Dobby
Line: Uhuh… Dobby feels most aggrieved, sir. Dobby had to iron his hands.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: You'd better clear off before my bones come back, Dobby, or I might strangle you!

Name: Dobby
Line: Uh-huh-huh… Dobby is used to death threats sir. Dobby gets them five times a day at home.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: I don't suppose you could tell me why you're trying to kill me?

Name: Dobby
Line: Not kill you, sir, never kill you! Dobby remembers how it was before Harry Potter triumphed over He-Who-Must-Not-Be-Named. We house elves were treated like vermin, sir. Of course, Dobby is still treated like vermin…uh, huh, huh, huh! Aah, ahh…

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Why do you wear that thing Dobby?

Name: Dobby
Line: This, sir? It is a mark of the house-elves' enslavement. Dobby can only be freed if his master presents him with clothes. Ah! Listen. Listen! Terrible things are about to happen at Hogwarts. Harry Potter must not stay here, now that history is to repeat itself.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Repeat itself? You mean this has happened before?

Name: Dobby
Line: Ah! I shouldn't have said that! Oh! Ah! Dah! Bad Dobby! Bad!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Dobby, stop it! Stop it! Stop, Dobby! Tell me, Dobby. When did this happen before? Who's doing it now?

Name: Dobby
Line: Dobby cannot say, sir. Dobby only wants Harry Potter to be safe.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: No, Dobby. Tell me. Who is it?

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: There's been another attack.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: It means…that our students are in great danger.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: The truth. Tell them Hogwarts is no longer safe. It is as we feared, Minerva. The Chamber of Secrets has indeed been opened again.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Again? You mean the Chamber of Secrets has been opened before?

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Of course. Don't you see? Lucius Malfoy must have opened it when he was at school here. And now he's taught Draco how to do it.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Maybe. We'll have to wait for the Polyjuice Potion to know for sure.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Enlighten me. Why are we brewing this potion in broad daylight, in the middle of a girl's lavatory? Don't you think we'll get caught?

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Heh… No. No one ever comes in here.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Why?

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Moaning Myrtle.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Who?

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Moaning Myrtle.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Who's Moaning Myrtle?

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: She's a little sensitive.

Name: Gilderoy Lockhart
Line: Gather 'round, gather 'round! Can everybody see me? Can you all hear me? Excellent! In light of the dark events of recent weeks, Professor Dumbledore has granted me permission to start this little Dueling Club to train you all up in case you ever need to defend yourselves, as I myself have done on countless occasions- for full details, see my published works. Let me introduce my assistant, Professor Snape. He has sportingly agreed to help me with a short demonstration. Now, I don't want any of you youngsters to worry- you'll still have your Potions master when I'm through with him, never fear. One, two, three.

Name: Gilderoy Lockhart
Line: Whoaah!

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Do you think he's all right?

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Who cares?

Name: Gilderoy Lockhart
Line: An excellent idea to show them that, Professor Snape, but if you don't mind me saying, it was pretty obvious- ah- what you were about to do. And if I had wanted to stop you, it would have been only too easy.

Name: Gilderoy Lockhart
Line: An excellent suggestion, Professor Snape! Ah… Let's have a volunteer pair! Um, Potter, Weasley, how about you?

Name: Gilderoy Lockhart
Line: Good luck, Potter.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Thank you, sir.

Name: Gilderoy Lockhart
Line: Wands at the ready.

Name: Draco Malfoy
Line: Scared, Potter?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: You wish.

Name: Gilderoy Lockhart
Line: On the count of three, cast your charms to disarm your opponent- only to disarm. We don't want any accidents here. One, two--

Name: Draco Malfoy
Line: Everte statium!

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Oh!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Rictusempra!

Name: Gilderoy Lockhart
Line: I said disarm only!

Name: Draco Malfoy
Line: Serpensortia!

Name: Gilderoy Lockhart
Line: Allow me, Professor Snape. Alarte ascendare!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Sya- hassa- she. Sya- hasi- heth. Sya- hasi- heth.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: You're a Parselmouth? Why didn't you tell us?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: I'm a what?

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: You can talk to snakes.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: I know. I mean, I accidentally set a python on my cousin Dudley at the zoo once. Uh, once! But, so what? I bet loads of people here can do it.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: No, they can't. It's not a very common gift, Harry. This is bad.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: What's bad? If I hadn't told that snake not to attack Justin.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Oh, that's what you said to it!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: You were there! You heard me!

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: I heard you speaking Parseltongue. Snake language?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: I spoke a different language? But- I didn't realize I- how can I speak a language without knowing I can?

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: I don't know, Harry, but it sounded like you were egging the snake on, or something. Harry, listen to me. There's a reason the symbol of Slytherin House is a serpent. Salazar Slytherin was a Parselmouth. He could talk to snakes, too.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Exactly! Now the whole school's gonna think you're his great- greatgreat grandson, or something.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: But I'm not… I can't be.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: He lived a thousand years ago; for all we know, you could be.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: I'll see you back in the common room.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: No! Mr. Filch! Y-you- you don't understand!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Professor… I swear I didn't!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Professor Dumbledore?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: I… I-I was- I was just wondering if you'd put me in the right house.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: You're wrong.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Harry?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Professor! Sir, your bird- there was nothing I could do- he- he just caught fire!

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Oh, and about time, too. He's been looking dreadful for days. Pity you had to see him on a burning day. Fawkes is a phoenix, Harry. They burst into flame when it is time for them to die, and then they are reborn from the ashes.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Ah, fascinating creatures, phoenixes. They can carry immensely heavy loads, and their- their tears have healing powers.

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: Professor Dumbledore, sir! Wait! Listen! Professor Dumbledore, sir, it wasn't Harry!

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Hagrid.

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: In fact, I'd be prepared ter swear it in front o' the Ministry of Magic!

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Hagrid! Relax. I do not believe that Harry attacked anyone.

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: Well, of course you don't, and… Oh… Oh, right. Well, I'll, umhum. I'll just wait outside, then.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Yes.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: You don't think it was me, Professor?

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: No, Harry. I do not think it was you… But I must ask you, is there something you wish to tell me?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: No, sir. Nothing.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Very well, then. Off you go.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Everything's set. We just need a bit of who you're changing into.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Crabbe and Goyle.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: We also need to make sure that the real Crabbe and Goyle can't burst in on us while we're interrogating Malfoy.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: How?

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: I've got it all worked out. I filled these with a simple Sleeping Draught. Simple, but powerful. Now, once they're asleep hide them in the broomstick cupboard and pull out a few of their hairs, and put on their uniforms.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Whose hair are you ripping out then?

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: I've already got mine. Millicent Bulstrode– Slytherin- I got this off her robes. I'm going to go check on the Polyjuice Potion. Make sure that Crabbe and Goyle find these.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Ahem…

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Ron, maybe I should do it?

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Yeah. Right.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Wingardium leviosa. Here they come.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: How thick could you get?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Come on. Let's get 'em.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: We'll have exactly one hour before we change back into ourselves… Add the hairs.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Ugh- essence of Crabbe.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Cheers!

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: I think I'm gonna be sick!

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Me too.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Ughh!

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Uh… Harry?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Ron!

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Bloody hell!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: We still sound like ourselves. You need to sound more like Crabbe.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Uh… Bloody hell.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Excellent.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: But where's Hermione?

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: I- I don't think I'm going. You go on without me!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Hermione, are you okay?

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Just go. You're wasting time!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Come on.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: I think the Slytherin common room's this way.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Okay.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: What are you doing d- uh, I mean… What are you doing down here?

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Uhh…

Name: Harry Potter
Line: I'm…

Name: Draco Malfoy
Line: Crabbe, Goyle! Where have you two been? Pigging out in the Great Hall all this time? Why are you wearing glasses?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Ah- um… Reading.

Name: Draco Malfoy
Line: Reading?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Uh-huh.

Name: Draco Malfoy
Line: I didn't know you could read. And what are you doing down here, Weasley?

Name: Draco Malfoy
Line: Well, sit down. You'd never know the Weasleys were pure-bloods, the way they behave. They're an embarrassment to the wizarding world. All of them. What's wrong with you, Crabbe?

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Ahem…Stomachache.

Name: Draco Malfoy
Line: You know, I'm surprised that the Daily Prophet hasn't done a report on all these attacks. I suppose Dumbledore is trying to hush it all up. Father always said Dumbledore was the worst thing that ever happened to this place.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: You're wrong!

Name: Draco Malfoy
Line: What? You think there's someone here who's worse than Dumbledore?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Harry Potter?

Name: Draco Malfoy
Line: Good one, Goyle. You're absolutely right. Saint Potter. And people actually think that he's the Heir of Slytherin!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: But then you must have some idea who's behind it all.

Name: Draco Malfoy
Line: You know I don't Goyle. I told you yesterday. How many times do I have to tell you? Is this yours? But my father did say this: It's been fifty years since the Chamber was opened. He wouldn't tell me who opened it-- only that they were expelled. The last time the Chamber of Secrets was opened, a Mudblood died. So, it's only a matter of time before one of them is killed this time. As for me, I hope it's Granger. What's the matter with you two? You're acting very…odd.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: It's his… stomachache. Calm down.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: S- scar.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Hair!

Name: Draco Malfoy
Line: Hey! Where are you going?

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: That was close!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Hermione, come out. We've got loads to tell you!

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Go away!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Hermione? A- are you OK?

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Do you remember me telling you that the Polyjuice Potion was only for human transformations? It was cat's hair I plucked off Millicent Bulstrode's robes. Look at my face.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Look at your tail!

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Have you spoken to Hermione?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: She should be out of hospital in a few days, when she stops coughing up fur balls… What's this?

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Yuck!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Looks like Moaning Myrtle's flooded the bathroom.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Why would I throw something at you?

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: But, it can't hurt if someone throws something at you. I mean, it'll just go right through you.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: But, who threw it at you, anyway?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: 'Tom Marvolo Riddle.'

Name: Harry Potter
Line: 'My name is Harry Potter.'

Name: Harry Potter
Line: 'Do you know anything about the Chamber of Secrets?'

Name: Harry Potter
Line: 'Can you tell me?'

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Excuse me. Could you tell me what's going on here? Are you Tom Riddle?

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Riddle! Come.

Name: Tom Riddle
Line: Professor Dumbledore.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Dumbledore?

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: It is not wise to be wandering around this late hour, Tom.

Name: Tom Riddle
Line: Yes, Professor. I- I suppose I- I had to see for myself if the rumors were true.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: I'm afraid they are, Tom. They are true.

Name: Tom Riddle
Line: About the school, as well? I don't have a home to go to. They wouldn't really close Hogwarts, would they Professor?

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: I understand Tom, but I'm afraid Headmaster Dippet may have no choice.

Name: Tom Riddle
Line: Sir- if it all stopped- if the person responsible was caught--

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Is there something you wish to tell me?

Name: Tom Riddle
Line: No, sir. Nothing.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Very well, then. Off you go.

Name: Tom Riddle
Line: Good night, sir.

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: Let's get yeh out of there.

Name: Tom Riddle
Line: Evening, Hagrid. I'm going to have to turn you in, Hagrid. I don't think you meant it to kill anyone, but--

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: You can't! You don't understand.

Name: Tom Riddle
Line: The dead girl's parents will be here tomorrow. The least Hogwarts can do is make sure the thing that killed their daughter is slaughtered.

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: It wasn't him. Aragog never killed no one! Never!

Name: Tom Riddle
Line: Monsters don't make good pets, Hagrid. Now, stand aside.

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: No!

Name: Tom Riddle
Line: Stand aside, Hagrid!

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: No!

Name: Tom Riddle
Line: Cistem aperio! Arania exumai!

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: Aragog! Aragog!

Name: Tom Riddle
Line: I can't let you go. They'll have your wand for this, Hagrid. You'll be expelled.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Hagrid! Haagriid!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Woah!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: It was Hagrid. Hagrid opened the Chanter of Secrets fifty years ago.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: It can't be Hagrid. It just can't be.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: We don't even know this Tom Riddle. He sounds like a dirty, rotten snitch to me.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: The monster had killed somebody, Ron. What would any of us have done?

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Look. Hagrid's our friend. Why don't we just go and ask him about it?

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: That'll be a cheerful visit! “Hello, Hagrid! Tell us, have you been setting anything mad and hairy loose in the castle lately?”

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: Mad and hairy? You wouldn't be talking about me now, would ya?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: No!

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: No!

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: No!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: W- what's that you've got, Hagrid?

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: Oh, It's a- Flesh-Eatin' Slug Repellent. For the Mandrakes, ya know. Now, accordin' to Professor Sprout, they've still got a bit o' growing up to do. But, once their acne's cleared up, we'll be able to chop 'em up and stew 'em, and then we'll get those people down at the hospital un-Petrified. In the meantime, though, you three had best be lookin' after yourselves. All right? Hmm.

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: Hello, Neville!

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: It had to be a Gryffindor. Nobody else knows our password- unless it wasn't a student.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Who ever it was, they must have been looking for something.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: And they found it. Tom Riddle's diary is gone.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Hermione!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: No.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: We've got to talk to Hagrid, Ron. I can't believe it's him, but if he did set the monster loose last time, he'll know how to get inside the Chamber of Secrets, and that's a start.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: But you heard McGonagall! We're not allowed to leave the tower except for class.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: I think it's time to get my Dad's old cloak out again.

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: Who's there? Hello? Hello?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: What's that for?

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: Oh, nothing. I- I was expecting, ah… It doesn't matter- come on inI just made a pot o' tea.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Hagrid, are you okay?

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: I'm fine! I'm alright.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Did you hear about Hermione?

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: Oh, yeah. I heard about that, all righ'.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Look, we have to ask you something. Do you know who's opened the Chamber of Secrets?

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: What you had to understand about that is—  Quick under the cloak. Don't say a word. Be quiet, both o' you… Professor Dumbledore, sir!

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Good evening, Hagrid. I wonder, could we…?

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: Of course! Come in! Come in.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: That's Dad's boss! Cornelius Fudge, Minister of Magic!

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: Oh, but I never- you know I never, Professor!

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: I want it understood, Cornelius, that Hagrid has my full confidence.

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: Take me? Take me where? Not Azkaban Prison?

Name: Lucius Malfoy
Line: Already here, Fudge? Good…

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: What're you doin' here? Get outta my house!

Name: Lucius Malfoy
Line: Believe me, I take absolutely no pleasure being inside your-- you call this a house? Huh! No. I simply called at the school, and was told the headmaster was here.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Well, what exactly is it that you want with me?

Name: Lucius Malfoy
Line: The other governors and I have decided it's time for you to step aside. This is an order of suspension. You'll find all twelve signatures on it. I'm afraid we feel you've rather lost your touch. Well, what, with all these attacks, there'll be no Muggle-borns left at Hogwarts. I can only imagine what an awful loss that would be to the school.

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: Yeh can' take Professor Dumbledore away. Take him away, an' the Muggle-borns won' stand a chance! You mark my words, there'll be killin's next!

Name: Lucius Malfoy
Line: You think so?

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Calm yourself, Hagrid. If the governors desire my removal, I will, of course, step aside. However, you will find that help will always be given at Hogwarts to those who ask for it.

Name: Lucius Malfoy
Line: Admirable sentiments. Shall we? Fudge!

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: Ahem! If, uh, if anybody was looking for some stuff, then all they'd have to do would be to follow the spiders. Yup! That would lead them right! That's all I have to say. Oh, and someone'll need to feed Fang while I'm away.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Hagrid's right! With Dumbledore gone, there'll be an attack a day!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Look! Well, come on. Come on, Fang!

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: What?!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: You heard what Hagrid said; 'Follow the spiders.'

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: They're headed to the Dark Forest! Why spiders! Why couldn't it be “follow the butterflies?”

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Harry, I don't like this… Harry, I don't like this at all!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Shush!

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Can we go back now?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Come on!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Don't panic.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: We're friends of Hagrid's. And you? Y- y-you're Aragog aren't you?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: He's in trouble. Up at the school, there have been attacks. They think it's Hagrid. They think he opened the Chamber of Secrets, like before.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Then you're not the monster.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Harry.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Shush. But if you're not the monster, then- then what did kill that girl fifty years ago?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: But have you seen it?

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Harry!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: What?

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Ahh- hhh…

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Well, thank you. We'll just…go.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Can we panic now?

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Know any spells?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: One, but it's not powerful enough for all of them.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Where's Hermione when you need her?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Let's go! Arania exumai! Go!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Whoah!

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Whoah!

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Glad we're out of there! Ah- Aaaah!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Arania exumai!

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Thanks for that.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Don't mention it. Get us out of here. Now! Come on! Come on! Move faster!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Aah!

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Aah!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Go on! Go! Get us in the air.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: The flying gear's jammed!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Come on! Pull!

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: I'm trying!

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Follow the spiders! Follow the spiders! If Hagrid ever gets out of Azkaban, I'll kill him! I mean, what was the point of sending us in there? What have we found out?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: We know one thing. Hagrid never opened the Chamber of Secrets. He was innocent.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Wish you were here Hermione. We need you… now, more than ever.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: What's that?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Ron, this is why Hermione was in the Library the day she was attacked. Come on!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: 'Of the many fearsome beasts that roam our land, none is more deadly than the basilisk. Capable of living for hundreds of years, instant death awaits any who meet this giant serpent's eye. Spiders flee before it.' Ron, this is it. The monster in the Chamber of Secrets is a basilisk. That's why I can hear it speak. It's a snake!

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: But if it kills by looking people in the eye, why is it no one's dead?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Because no one did look it in the eye. Not directly, at least. Colin saw it through his camera. Justin…Justin must have seen the basilisk through Nearly Headless Nick. Nick got the full blast of it- but he's a ghost- he couldn't die again. And Hermione…had the mirror. I bet you anything she was using it to look around corners, in case it came along.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: And Mrs. Norris? I'm pretty sure she didn't have a camera or a mirror, Harry.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: The water. There was water on the floor that night. She only saw the basilisk's reflection. 'Spiders flee before it.' It all fits!

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: But how's a basilisk been getting around? A dirty great snake- someone would have seen it.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Hermione's answered that, too.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Pipes? It's using the plumbing!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Remember what Aragog said, about that girl fifty years ago? She died in a bathroom? What if she never left?

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Moaning Myrtle.

Name: Gilderoy Lockhart
Line: So sorry- dozed off- what have I missed?

Name: Gilderoy Lockhart
Line: My m-moment?

Name: Gilderoy Lockhart
Line: Very well- ah- I'll just be in my office getting, umgetting ready.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: 'Her skeleton will lie in the chamber forever.' Ginny…

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Lockhart may be useless, but he's going to try and get into the Chamber. At least we can tell him what we know.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Professor, we have some information for you! Are you going somewhere?

Name: Gilderoy Lockhart
Line: Uh, ah- well, yes- um, urgent call- unavoidable- got to go.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: What about my sister?!

Name: Gilderoy Lockhart
Line: Well, um- as to that, most unfortunate. No one regrets more than I.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: You're the Defense Against the Dark Arts teacher! You can't go now!

Name: Gilderoy Lockhart
Line: Well- I must say- when I took the job there was nothing in the job description about a…

Name: Harry Potter
Line: You're running away? After all that stuff you did in your books?

Name: Gilderoy Lockhart
Line: Books can be misleading!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: You wrote them!

Name: Gilderoy Lockhart
Line: My dear boy, do use your common sense! My books wouldn't have sold half as well if people didn't think I'd done all those things!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: You're a fraud! You've just been taking credit for what other wizards have done!

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Is there anything you can do?

Name: Gilderoy Lockhart
Line: Yes, now you mention it. I'm rather gifted with Memory Charms. Otherwise, you see, all those wizards would have gone blabbing. And I'd never have sold another book. In fact, ah…I'm ah…going to have to do the same to you.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Don't even think about it.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: To ask you how you died.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Who was it Myrtle?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Just like that? How?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: This is it. This is it, Ron. I think this is the entrance to the Chamber of Secrets.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Say something. Harry, say something in Parseltongue!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Hesha- Hassah.

Name: Gilderoy Lockhart
Line: Excellent, Harry. Haa! Good work! Well then, I'll just be, ah… There's no need for me to stay.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Oh, yes there is! You first.

Name: Gilderoy Lockhart
Line: Now, boys what good will it do?

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Better you than us.

Name: Gilderoy Lockhart
Line: Um…but…obviously, yes. Sure you don't want to test it first? No! Aaaah! It's really quite filthy down here.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: All right. Let's go.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Uh…thanks Myrtle.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Aaah!

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Aaah!

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Ugh!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Now remember, any sign of movement, close your eyes straightaway.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Go on.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: This way.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: What's this?

Name: Gilderoy Lockhart
Line: It looks like a… snake.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: It's a snakeskin.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Bloody hell. Whatever shed this must be sixty feet long-- or more! Heart of a lion, this one.

Name: Gilderoy Lockhart
Line: The adventure ends here, boys. But don't fret. The world will know our story. How I was too late to save the girl. How you two tragically lost your minds at the sight of her mangled body. So, you first, Mr. Potter. Say good-bye to your memories. Obliviate!

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Harry! Harry!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Ron! Ron, are you ok?

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: I'm fine!

Name: Gilderoy Lockhart
Line: Uhh… Hello. Who are you?

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Um…Ron Weasley.

Name: Gilderoy Lockhart
Line: Really? And uh, who- who am I?

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Lockhart's memory charm backfired. He hasn't got a clue who he is!

Name: Gilderoy Lockhart
Line: It's an odd sort of place this, isn't it? Do you live here?

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: No!

Name: Gilderoy Lockhart
Line: Really? Well?

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: What'll do I do now?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: You wait here and try and shift some of this rock so we can get back through. I'll go on and find Ginny!

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: OK.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Hesha- Hassah.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Ginny… Ginny! Oh, Ginny, please don't be dead. Wake up. Wake up! Please, wake up!

Name: Tom Riddle
Line: She won't wake.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Tom. Tom Riddle! What do you mean, 'she won't wake?' She's not…?

Name: Tom Riddle
Line: She's still alive, but only just.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Are you a ghost?

Name: Tom Riddle
Line: A memory, preserved in a diary for fifty years.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: She's cold as ice. Ginny, please don't be dead. Wake up! You've got to help me, Tom. There's a basilisk.

Name: Tom Riddle
Line: It won't come until it's called.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Give me my wand, Tom.

Name: Tom Riddle
Line: You won't be needing it.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Listen, we've got to go! We've got to save her!

Name: Tom Riddle
Line: I'm afraid I can't do that, Harry. You see, as poor Ginny grows weaker, I grow stronger. Yes Harry, it was Ginny Weasley who opened the Chamber of Secrets.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: No. She couldn't. She wouldn't!

Name: Tom Riddle
Line: It was Ginny who set the basilisk on the Mudbloods and Filch's cat, Ginny who wrote the threatening messages on the walls.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: But why?

Name: Tom Riddle
Line: Because I told her to. You'll find that I can be very persuasive. Not that she knew what she was doing. She was, shall we say, in a kind of trance. Still, the power of the diary began to scare her. And she tried to dispose of it in the girl's bathroom. And then, who should find it, but you? The very person I was most anxious to meet.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: But, why did you want to meet me?

Name: Tom Riddle
Line: I knew I had to talk to you, meet you if I could. So I decided to show you my capture of that brainless oaf, Hagrid, to gain your trust.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Hagrid's my friend! And you framed him, didn't you?

Name: Tom Riddle
Line: It was my word against Hagrid's. Only Dumbledore seemed to think he was innocent.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: I'll bet Dumbledore saw right through you.

Name: Tom Riddle
Line: He certainly kept an annoyingly close watch on me after that. I knew it wouldn't be safe to open the Chamber again while I was still at school, so I decided to leave behind a diary preserving my sixteen-year-old self in its pages, so that one day I would be able to lead another to finish Salazar Slytherin's noble work.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Well, you haven't finished it this time. In a few hours, the Mandrake Draught will be ready, and everyone who was Petrified will be all right again.

Name: Tom Riddle
Line: Haven't I told you? Killing Mudbloods doesn't matter to me anymore. For many months now, my new target… has been you. How is it that a baby, with no extraordinary magical talent, was able to defeat the greatest wizard of all time? How did you escape with nothing but a scar, while Lord Voldemort's powers were destroyed?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Why do you care how I escaped? Voldemort was after your time.

Name: Tom Riddle
Line: Voldemort is my past, present, and future.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: You! You're the Heir of Slytherin. You're Voldemort.

Name: Tom Riddle
Line: Surely, you didn't think I was going to keep my filthy Muggle father's name? No. I fashioned myself a new name, a name I knew wizards everywhere would one day fear to speak, when I became the greatest sorcerer in the world.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Albus Dumbledore is the greatest sorcerer in the world!

Name: Tom Riddle
Line: Dumbledore's been driven out of this castle by the mere memory of me!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: He'll never be gone! Not as long as those who remain are loyal to him! Fawkes?

Name: Tom Riddle
Line: So, this is what Dumbledore sends his great defender, a songbird and an old hat. Shearhas- Samnathas- Sélithaeine.

Name: Tom Riddle
Line: Let's match the power of Lord Voldemort, Heir of Salazar Slytherin, against the famous Harry Potter. Sethae- He- This. Parseltongue won't save you now, Potter. It only obeys me!

Name: Tom Riddle
Line: No! Your bird may have blinded the basilisk, but it can still hear you!

Name: Tom Riddle
Line: Yes, Potter, the process is nearly complete. In a few minutes Ginny will be dead, and I will cease to be a memory. Lord Voldemort will return- very… much… alive!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Ginny-

Name: Tom Riddle
Line: Remarkable isn't it, how quickly the venom of the basilisk penetrates the body? I'd guess you have little more than a minute to live. You'll be with your dear Mudblood mother soon, Harry. Funny, the damage a silly little book can do… especially in the hands of a silly, little girl. What are you doing? Stop! No! Ahhhh! Ahhhh! Ahhhh!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Ginny…

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Don't worry. Ginny, you need to get yourself out. Follow the Chamber, and you'll find Ron. You were brilliant, Fawkes. I just wasn't quick enough… Of course! Phoenix tears have healing powers. Thanks! It's alright, Ginny. It's over. It's just a memory.

Name: Gilderoy Lockhart
Line: Amazing! This is just like magic!

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: You both realize, of course, that in the past few hours you have broken perhaps a dozen school rules?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Yes, sir.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Yes, sir.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: And there is sufficient evidence to have you both expelled.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Yes, sir.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Yes, sir.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Therefore, it is only fitting, that you both receive Special Awards for Services to the School.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Thanks, sir!

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: And now, Mr. Weasley, if you would, have an owl deliver these release papers to Azkaban? I believe we- we want our gamekeeper back. Harry… first, I want to thank you, Harry. You must have shown me real loyalty down in the Chamber. Nothing but that could have called Fawkes to you. And, um… second, I sense that something is troubling you. Am I right, Harry?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: It's just… You see, sir I- I couldn't help but notice certain things, certain- certain similarities, between Tom Riddle and me.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: I see. Well, you can speak Parseltongue, Harry. Why? Because Lord Voldemort can speak Parseltongue. If I'm not mistaken, Harry, he transferred some of his powers to you the night he gave you that scar.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Voldemort transferred some of his powers… to me?

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Not intentionally, but yes.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: So the Sorting Hat was right! I should be in Slytherin.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: It's true, Harry. You possess many of the qualities that Voldemort himself prizes. Determination, resourcefulness, and if I may say so, a certain disregard for the rules. Why then did the Sorting Hat place you in Gryffindor?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Because I asked it to.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Exactly, Harry! Exactly! Which makes you different from Voldemort. It is not our abilities that show what we truly are. It is our choices. If you want proof why you belong in Gryffindor, then I suggest that you look more closely at this. Be careful.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Godric Gryffindor.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Ah- it would take a true Gryffindor to pull that out of the hat.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Dobby! So this is your master! The family you serve is the Malfoys

Name: Dobby
Line: Um-humm…

Name: Lucius Malfoy
Line: I'll deal with you later. Out of my way, Potter! So, it's true-- you have returned!

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: When the governors learned that Arthur Weasley's daughter was taken into the Chamber, they saw fit to summon me back.

Name: Lucius Malfoy
Line: Ridiculous!

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Curiously, Lucius, several of them were under the impression that you would curse their families, if they did not agree to suspend me in the first place.

Name: Lucius Malfoy
Line: How dare you?!

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: I beg your pardon?

Name: Lucius Malfoy
Line: My sole concern has always been, and will always be, the welfare of this school and, of course, its students. The culprit has been identified, I presume?

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Oh, yes.

Name: Lucius Malfoy
Line: And? Who was it?

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Voldemort.

Name: Lucius Malfoy
Line: Ah!

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Only, this time, he chose to act through somebody else, by means of this.

Name: Lucius Malfoy
Line: I see.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Fortunately, our young Mr. Potter discovered it. One hopes that no more of Lord Voldemort's old school things should find their way into innocent hands. The consequences for the one responsible would be severe.

Name: Lucius Malfoy
Line: Well, let us hope that Mr. Potter will always be around to save the day.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Don't worry. I will be.

Name: Lucius Malfoy
Line: Dumbledore. Come, Dobby. We're leaving.

Name: Dobby
Line: Ahh! Oow!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Sir, I wonder if I could have that?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Mr. Malfoy! Mr. Malfoy! I have something of yours.

Name: Lucius Malfoy
Line: Mine? I don't know what you're talking about.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Oh, I think you do, sir. I think you slipped the diary into Ginny Weasley's cauldron, that day at Diagon Alley.

Name: Lucius Malfoy
Line: You do, do you? Why don't you prove it? Come, Dobby. Dobby!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Open it.

Name: Lucius Malfoy
Line: Dobby?

Name: Dobby
Line: Master has given Dobby a sock!

Name: Lucius Malfoy
Line: What? I didn't give.

Name: Dobby
Line: Master has presented Dobby with clothes! Dobby is free!

Name: Lucius Malfoy
Line: You've lost me my servant!

Name: Dobby
Line: You shall not harm Harry Potter!

Name: Lucius Malfoy
Line: Advada.

Name: Lucius Malfoy
Line: Your parents were meddlesome fools, too. You mark my words, Potter, one day soon you are going to meet the same sticky end!

Name: Dobby
Line: Harry Potter freed Dobby! How can Dobby ever repay him?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Just promise me something.

Name: Dobby
Line: Anything, sir!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Never try to save my life again.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Thanks, Sir Nicholas!

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Uhh-um… Welcome back, Hermione.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: It's good to be back! Congratulations! I can't believe you solved it!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Well, we had loads of help from you. We couldn't have done it without you.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Thanks.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Before we begin the feast, let us have a round of applause for Professor Sprout and Madame Pomfrey, whose Mandrake juice has been so successfully administered to all who had been Petrified. Also, in light of the recent events, as a school treat, all exams have been canceled.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Oh, no!

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: Sorry I'm late! The owl that delivered my release papers got all lost and confused. Some ruddy bird called Errol. And I'd just like to say that aif it hadn't been for you, Harry, and Ron, and Hermione, o' course, I woulduh- I'd still be you-know-where, so I- I'd just like to say 'Thanks.'

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Well, there's no Hogwarts without you, Hagrid.

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: Oh!
